name: Game Jam: You Are the Monster
name_original: Game Jam: You Are the Monster
description:
Hiya!

Instructions:

W,S- tilt down, up

Q, E- tilt left, right

A,D- turn left, right

Space- Fire

I made this game for a game jam about being a monster.

There was no offense or mal-intent behind the development of this game.

Thanks! Enjoy!!

-Eric
